item.title: Understanding Variogram in Geospatial Analysis
item.description: Introduction Geospatial analysis often involves understanding the spatial relationships between data points. One foundational concept in this domain is the variogram. In this article, we will explore what a variogram is, how it is used in Kriging, and how to compute experimental and semi-variograms for hypothetical borehole data.
